description.en: A Gestahlian general who refused Magitek infusions and climbed the ranks with his own resourcefulness. He despises contemptible conduct and as such is constantly at odds with Kefka. He has great regard for human life、 whether it be friend or foe、 his noble nature even acknowledged by enemy nations.
description.jp:
ガストラ帝国にありながら 魔導の力の
注入を拒み 己の才覚のみで将軍まで
上り詰めた男。卑劣なことを嫌い
手段を選ばないケフカとはそのことで
ぶつかり合う。敵味方を問わず人命を
重んじる考えを持っており 
その人柄は敵対国にも一目置かれる。

desc.en: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.gl: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.jp: 近距離物理攻撃\n相手のBRVを奪う攻撃

desc.en: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.gl: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.jp: 自身のBRVを消費して\n相手のHPを削る攻撃

desc.en:
Raises BRV based on Attack before attacking
2-HIT melee BRV + HP attack
Inflicts [Breakthrough Point] for 3 turns
Cancels previously inflicted [Breakthrough Point] when attacking a different target
Grants [Commander] for 3 turns

[Breakthrough Point] increases BRV damage taken by single target attacks
※Does not include attacks where hits are distributed based on number of enemies

[Commander] has the following effects:
• Raises own Max BRV and Attack
• Grants party HP Regen
※Does not stack with same buff
desc.gl:
Increases BRV based on ATK
2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
Target: 3 turns Precision Strike
(Cancels Precision Strike inflicted previously on different target)
Self: 3 turns Leader
desc.jp:
自身に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算
＋2HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
対象に3ACTION「一点突破」付与
（「一点突破」が付与された対象と別の対象に付与した場合
　先に付与された「一点突破」は解除される）
自身に3ACTION「統率者」付与

desc.gl: Precision Strike: Increases BRV damage taken from single-target BRV attacks (excludes attacks distributed based on number of enemies)
desc.jp: 一点突破：単体BRV攻撃を受けた時 より大きなBRVダメージ（敵の数に応じて対象が分散する攻撃は除く）

desc.gl: Leader: Raises own MAX BRV, ATK; restores a certain amount of party's HP (does not stack)
desc.jp: 統率者：自身の最大BRV 攻撃力が上昇し 味方全員のHPを一定量回復（同名の強化効果は重複しない）

desc.gl:
Grants party BRV based on own ATK
4-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Target: 6 turns Precision Strike

Self: 6 turns Leader

味方全員に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算

Tremendously raises BRV damage when there is only one target

HP damage is split equally amongst all enemies

desc.en:
When using 「Concentrated Strike」:
- Gained BRV based on Attack is applied to all party members
- BRV attack hit count becomes 4
- Tremendously raises total BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
- Extends duration of 「Breakthrough Point」 by 3 turns
- Extends duration of 「Commander」 by 3 turns

When 「Commander」 is active:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」 into 「BRV Attack+」
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Moderately raises total BRV potency
- Turns 「HP Attack」 into 「HP Attack+」
　∟ 2-HIT melee BRV Attack + HP Attack
desc.gl:
When using Call for Precision Strike:
 • BRV increased based on ATK extended to party
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Precision Strike duration +3
 • Leader duration +3

While Leader active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack)
desc.jp:
「一点突破の檄」使用時
・自身の攻撃力に依存したBRV加算を味方全体化

　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・「一点突破」の3ACTION期間延長
・「統率者」の3ACTION期間延長

　　合計BRV威力も中アップ

- Greatly raises BRV potency
- Slightly raises Max BRV overflow limit
- Doesn't consume ability use on the next turn
desc.gl:
When using Shock, Shock+:
 • Large BRV damage boost
 • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
 • Next turn after use does not consume ability use count
desc.jp:
「ショック」「ショック＋」使用時
・BRV威力大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限を小アップ
・使用後 次の行動時 アビリティの使用回数を消費しない
　（一部のアビリティを除く）

name.en: Wisdom of a Master Martial Artist Extend Attack Boost Up++
name.gl: Extreme Martial Talent Extension Attack Boost Up++
name.jp: 極めし武芸の才覚エクステンドアタックブーストアップ＋＋

desc.en:
Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack

When 「Commander」 is active:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」, 「BRV Attack+」 into 「BRV Attack++」
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 3
　∟ Slightly raises total BRV potency when compared to 「BRV Attack+」
- Turns 「HP Attack」, 「HP Attack+」 into 「HP Attack++」
　∟ 3-HIT melee BRV + HP attack
　∟ Moderately raises total BRV potency when compared to 「HP Attack+」
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
desc.gl:
While equipping EX+ weapon General's Sword (VI)+ or passive ability Extreme Martial Talent Extension:
 • Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK

While Leader active:
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (BRV attack hit count becomes 3; slight cumulative BRV damage boost over BRV Attack+)
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (3-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack; moderate cumulative BRV damage boost over HP Attack+; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
desc.jp:
EX+武器「名将軍の剣【VI】+」
またはパッシブ「極めし武芸の才覚エクステンド」装備時
自身の最大BRVと攻撃力を中アップ

「統率者」付与中
・通常「BRV攻撃」「BRV攻撃＋」が
　「BRV攻撃＋＋」に変化し
　BRV攻撃のHIT数が3HITに変化し
　「BRV攻撃＋」よりも合計BRV威力も小アップ
・通常「HP攻撃」「HP攻撃＋」が
　「HP攻撃＋＋」に変化し
　-3HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃に変化し
　　「HP攻撃＋」よりも合計BRV威力も中アップ
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
